TopicTitle: How can I get my kerbals to run straight while using time warp?

Articles.Content:
I have seen youtube videos of other people's kerbals running straight at 4x time warp, but mine wobble from side to side like crazy using any time warp at all! like this:

I am only pressing  "w"

Running in warp is all kinds of weird. I noticed, for example, that while it takes less real time to run distances this way, it was actually _slower_ in game time. I don't believe there is an efficient way to do it.
